title: Google will soon aggregate cloud streaming games and where to play them, starting on Chromebooks
content:
Ever eager to organize the world’s information, Google will soon be offering a way to sort through today’s cloud gaming services to figure which games can be played where, with an aggregator starting on Chromebooks.

more…

The post Google will soon aggregate cloud streaming games and where to play them, starting on Chromebooks appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google will soon offer an aggregator of cloud gaming services to help figure out which games can be played where, starting on Chromebooks.
